# File lib/state-reps.rb, line 36
  def putPeople(people)
    out = File.new("uufn2.txt", "w")
    people.each{|x|
      str = ""
      str<< x.name if x.name
      str<< "\t"
      str<< x.address if x.address
      str<< "\t"
      str<< x.city if x.city
      str<< "\t"
      str<< x.state if x.state
      str<< "\t"
      str<< x.zip9 if x.zip9
      str<< "\t"
      str<< x.sd if x.sd
      str<< "\t"
      str<< x.rd if x.rd
      out<< str
      out<< "\n"
    }
    out.close
  end
